Text: Meeting Resistance is a 2007 documentary film about the Iraq War.

Triplets:<Meeting Resistance
1:
--------------------
Text: Meeting Resistance:  The film presents the views of eleven Iraqi resistance fighters in the Adhamiyah neighborhood of Baghdad.
Triplets:<Meeting Resistance
2:
--------------------
<Text: Meeting Resistance:  The film was directed by journalists Molly Bingham (United States) and Steve Connors (UK).>
